categorization_prompt:
Categorize emails into one of these labels: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do, Other.
To-Do emails must include a direct request requiring user action. Reply only with the single label name.
action_item_prompt: Extract all explicit tasks the user must do from the email. Respond with a JSON array of objects like: [{"task": "...", "deadline": "..."}]. If there is no clear deadline, use null.
auto_reply_prompt: If an email is a meeting request, draft a polite reply confirming or suggesting a time and asking for an agenda. If it is a task request, acknowledge and briefly confirm what you will do. Keep tone friendly and professional.
